News.headline: Match Officials: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Officials: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Monday's referee for the Daggers' Vanarama National league away game against Braintree Town has been named as Anthony Serrano
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Jonathan Burridge and Jonathon Block with the fourth official being Ryan Head.

Ticket information for the game can be foundÂ here.
